channel.title: Error conection to server
channel.description: I have downloaded nividia v6 source and client. In client folder finded client.java and changed ip to mine.. When i compiled and tryed turn on the server.. Server is turned, but when i try to login in server it writes error conection to server. Where's the problem? Maybe someone can help me with it in tv?

item.title: Error conection to server
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_So_Cool Java Is So Cool
item.description:
@Java_Is_So_Cool wrote:

in the client the ip has to be 127.0.0.1 and sometimes the ip is also in other java files in delta such as gui/egui. rep me if i helped you

Read full topic
